page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content:
{ continued from page 8}
David and Emlyn arrived home and at 5.15 I served and ate a meal with my family,watch news headlines on television at 6.00 before washing up and preparing lunch boxes for the next day.I helped Sarah to clean the hamster cage,then clean shoes.At 7.30 I went on my regular Monday evening visit to an elderly neighbour for a chat.(Emlyn put Sarah to bed.) Arrived home at 8.15 put our school clothes ready for morning and at 9.15 I shooed David off to bed.I sat down at approx: 9.30 to relax with a book.Emlyn prepared drinking choclate,then to bed at 11.15!!
